p: All chemicals, unless otherwise stated, were of the highest quality and were used as supplied. Carvacrol (99.9%), thymol (98.5%), dichlorofluorescin diacetate (DCFH-DA), N-acetyl- l-cysteine (NAC), and trypan blue were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). RPMI 1640 culture medium with l-glutamine, fetal bovine serum (FBS), penicillin–streptomycin, Hank’s Buffered Saline Solution (HBSS), and phosphate-buffered Saline EDTA (PBS) were purchased from Lonza (Basel, Switzerland). Dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) was obtained from Molecular Probes (Eugene, OR, USA). Annexin-V-FITC, propidium iodide (PI), and Z-VAD-FMK were obtained from BD Pharmingen (San Diego, CA, USA). Caspase-3, caspase-9, Chop, p-AKT, PI3K, and β-actin antibodies were obtained from Cell Signaling (Danvers, MA, USA).
